content: Captain Wise-Voice is one of the four captains you can find in Chapter 3, and is a required boss to escape the prison of the Pagoda Realm. You can reach him by escaping up through the four levels of the Pagoda Prison and past the Outside the Wheel Shrine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Captain_Wise-Voice.md', within the main section titled 'Captain Wise-Voice', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Captain Wise-Voice'.
The content is as follows:
Captain Wise-Voice is one of the four captains you can find in Chapter 3, and is a required boss to escape the prison of the Pagoda Realm. You can reach him by escaping up through the four levels of the Pagoda Prison and past the Outside the Wheel Shrine.
